eu.casoftworks.jdroidlib.interfaces

Interface IResourceManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable

    public interface IResourceManager
extends java.io.Closeable
    Interface for defining the resource manager used internally by JDroidLib. Contains all the methods necessary for managing resources used by JDroidLib.
    Author:
    Simon Cahill

        java.io.File getAdb()
             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException

        Returns:

        Throws:
